alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Kleberg Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 3:59PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kleberg County through 430 PM CST... At 359 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Malaquite Beach, or 22 miles south of Corpus Christi, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Kleberg County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to minor flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
